sense.gloss: chef (esp. of high-end Japanese cuisine), cook
area of a kitchen that contains the chopping board

sdata.j: ↑影↑↓かげ↓でこそこそせず↑面↑↓めん↓と↑向↑↓む↓かって↑彼↑↓かれ↓にそれを↑言↑↓い↓|いたまえ|。
sdata.e: Say it to his face, not behind his back.

sdata.j: さあいらっしゃい、↑何↑↓なに↓を↑召↑↓め↓し↑上↑↓あ↓がるか↑言↑↓い↓|いたまえ|。
sdata.e: Step right up, gents, and say what you'll have.
